snippet: Iran will start cutting gasoline subsidies this week, an official said on Monday, a move that will test President Hassan Rouhani's public support as higher petrol prices add to inflation in a country already squeezed by economic sanctions....

headline.print_headline: Iran to Cut Gasoline Subsidy This Week, in Test of Rouhani's Support
headline.main: Iran to Cut Gasoline Subsidy This Week, in Test of Rouhani's Support

lead_paragraph: Iran will start cutting gasoline subsidies this week, an official said on Monday, a move that will test President Hassan Rouhani's public support as higher petrol prices add to inflation in a country already squeezed by economic sanctions.
